scripts.clean: WORKING_DIR=bot npm run clean-project && WORKING_DIR=send npm run clean-project && WORKING_DIR=tweet npm run clean-project && rm -rf dist
scripts.build: WORKING_DIR=bot npm run build-project && WORKING_DIR=send npm run build-project && WORKING_DIR=tweet npm run build-project
scripts.lint: WORKING_DIR=bot npm run lint-project && WORKING_DIR=send npm run lint-project && WORKING_DIR=tweet npm run lint-project
scripts.lint-fix: WORKING_DIR=bot npm run lint-fix-project && WORKING_DIR=send npm run lint-fix-project && WORKING_DIR=tweet npm run lint-fix-project
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd terraform && terraform apply -var-file='variables.tfvars'
